issue.title: What did you developers do?

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/?ref=mygaysites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Quick reminder if you want me to stop making issue tickets than stop not responding anymore on the ones already made again I am paying for AdGuard so I don’t understand why I have to make multiple issue tickets just to get a response now with that out of the way 

Okay, so I’m gonna try this way you all seem to be having no issue Alex, BlazDT, Zolyden,yougotskinny, and Krystian watching multiple videos on gaypornhdfree.com with your AdGuard active so clearly the issue is not with Adguard than it’s either with my phone, my internet provider, internet protocol, or I just didn’t follow the steps exactly and or in the correct order 

So please thoroughly explain the step by step process and the order of the process you did to accomplish Adguard never being detected when trying to play videos on gaypornhdfree.com

if I can determine with your help that I have now with confirmation followed the steps to the letter that you all followed to accomplish this,

than I can check this one off and realize it’s an issue with my phone, internet provider, or my internet protocol, 

but I want know unless one of you explains thoroughly what you did of step by step and the order to make gaypornhdfree.com never detect AdGuard each time, 


So please respond as asap with the detailed instructions of what you did 
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Correct.
> 
> @@ rules are telling AdGuard to not block an URL or to disable specific functions on the page (in this case generic hiding rules to avoid AdBlock detections). #%# rules are so called javascript rules which can overwrite site-s declared values. Such rules require Advanced protection though.

Oh my fuck I can’t thank you enough it’s working!!!! Perfectly!!!!!!!!! It’s working!!!! I could kiss you, I mean how can I repay you by giving you a review? Like I mean is there anyway I can repay you??????

issue.title: logitech.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO-1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.logitech.com/en-gb/products/mice.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

It only shows up in Chrome.
`qoe-jh.yottaa.net/log-jh`


<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/110184059/209245237-5b72c3f6-ea9b-43b7-8523-e7e1a99a239b.png)

</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Used to send visitor/site/session IDs, page category (seems different for search & product pages), and page URL via `navigator.sendBeacon` from Rapid+JS (`https://cdn.yottaa.com/rapid.security.min.7.1.1.js`), so looks like tracking.
EP blocks this via their `$third-party,ping` rule and it doesn't seem to break anything.
Both `hxxpx://www.uline[.]ca/` and `hxxpx://es.uline[.]mx/` use this script too.

Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` via AdGuard menu in your browser toolbar.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 브라우저 툴바에 있는 AdGuard 아이콘을 통해 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions.
